Hero.title: VERITUS
Hero.description: The next generation of legal intelligence. Every citation verified. Every answer trusted. Built for lawyers who demand precision in an era of uncertainty.

About.title: Law Shouldn't Be a
About.problemDesc: Every day, legal professionals waste hours verifying citations, chasing amendments, and second guessing AI hallucinations.
About.solutionDesc: Veritus eliminates uncertainty with source backed answers, real time legal updates, and zero tolerance for hallucinations.
About.futureDesc: A new era where lawyers trust their AI completely, focusing on strategy instead of fact checking.
About.closing: The next era of legal integrity starts here.

Features.title: Precision
Features.subtitle: Three pillars of legal AI you can trust
Features.sourceBackedDesc: Ask any legal question and receive answers with verifiable citations from primary sources. Every claim. Every time.
Features.documentDesc: Upload contracts, statutes, or case law. Instantly highlight key provisions, cross-reference citations, and understand context (coming soon).
Features.jurisdictionDesc: Real time updates to federal, state, and regional law (coming soon). Never miss an amendment or new precedent again.

Global.title: Starting Local,
Global.description: We're mastering Federal law first. Then every statute, every case, every update. Then expanding nationwide with the same uncompromising precision.

Contact.title: Join the
Contact.description: Be among the first legal professionals to experience AI that never compromises on truth.

Login.title: Login

Login.verificationInbox: Check your inbox for the verification link we sent when you registered.
Login.verificationSpam: Don't see it? Check your spam folder or contact support.

Register.title: Register
Register.verificationMessage: We've sent a verification link to
Register.verificationInstructions: Click the verification link in the email to activate your account.
Register.verificationExpiry: The link will expire in 24 hours. Check your spam folder if you don't see it.
